patthana16.38:1.1_0: Hīnaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahīno nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa,
patthana16.38:1.1_1: ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke aṭṭha …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.38:2.1_0: Hīnaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namajjhimo nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.38:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke cha …pe… avigate nava.
